mods.abstract: Describes the growth and structure of a tree, how to fell a tree, and the values of a forest.

Narration, Steve McCormick ; sound, Reuben Ford.
Received: ca. 7/15/1948 non-viewing print; transfer; U.S. Government Films Collection.
